abstract: Apple is cooperating with the European Commission in examining reports of problems with two iPhones in France and an iPod in Britain.
snippet: Apple is cooperating with the European Commission in examining reports of problems with two iPhones in France and an iPod in Britain.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  The European Commission said Tuesday that it was examining the safety of Apple iPhones and iPods, after news reports said that several of the devices had exploded.

headline.main: European Regulators Examine Reports of Exploding iPhones
headline.print_headline: European Regulators Examine Reports of Exploding iPhones
